medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began 2 weeks prior to presentation and were characterized by exertional dyspnea. The intensity and any changes over time were not specified, but he had no distress during the examination.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Pertinent medical history includes hypertension, nephrolithiasis, and internal hemorrhoids.
medical_history.family_history: His father died after a myocardial infarction at 57 years of age.
medical_history.social_history: Former smoker of 1 pack of cigarettes daily for 15 years, ceased 10 years prior to presentation; consumes 2 glasses of alcohol weekly; denies illicit drug use; has limited caffeine intake; and works as an architect.
